title: Why do we need to know how to search?
intro_p1: During service, it's common for customers to have questions about basic store information, such as address, opening hours and contact methods.
intro_p2: Knowing where to find this information and how to guide them correctly demonstrates:

c1.title: Confidence
c1.text: Convey trust to the customer with correct and up-to-date information.

c2.title: Agility
c2.text: Resolve questions quickly and effectively, promoting customer satisfaction.

c3.title: Care
c3.text: Show attention and care for the customer in every interaction.

box_text: Let's learn where to find all this information for faster and more accurate service!
